snippet.title: Marvel Studios' Thor: Love and Thunder | Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Here it is. ❤️  + ⚡

Marvel Studios' Thor: Love and Thunder arrives only in theaters July 8.

The film finds Thor (Chris Hemsworth) on a journey unlike anything he’s ever faced – a quest for inner peace. But his retirement is interrupted by a galactic killer known as Gorr the God Butcher (Christian Bale), who seeks the extinction of the gods. To combat the threat, Thor enlists the help of King Valkyrie (Tessa Thompson), Korg (Taika Waititi) and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster (Natalie Portman), who – to Thor’s surprise – inexplicably wields his magical hammer, Mjolnir, as the Mighty Thor. Together, they embark upon a harrowing cosmic adventure to uncover the mystery of the God Butcher’s vengeance and stop him before it’s too late. Directed by Waititi (“Thor: Ragnarok,” “Jojo Rabbit”) and produced by Kevin Feige and Brad Winderbaum, “Thor: Love and Thunder” opens in theaters July 8, 2022.

► Watch Marvel on Disney+: https://bit.ly/2XyBSIW
► Subscribe to Marvel on YouTube: http://bit.ly/WeO3YJ

snippet.title: THOR Love And Thunder Official Trailer Breakdown | Easter Eggs, Things You Missed & Reaction
snippet.description:
THOR Love And Thunder Official Trailer Breakdown | Easter Eggs, Things You Missed, Gorr And Jane Explained & Reaction. We breakdown the brand new Marvel Studios Thor Love And Thunder Trailer. This has lots of comic callbacks, hidden details and clues about the plot.

#Thor #ThorLoveAndThunder #Trailer #TrailerBreakdown #ThingsYouMissed #EasterEggs #HiddenDetails #JaneFoster

If you enjoyed this video then please subscribe to the channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ?sub_confirmation=1

If You Want To Help Support The Channel So I Can Make More Videos Like This Please Donate Here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq3hT5JPPKy87JGbDls_5BQ/join

Get some awesome Heavy Spoilers show clothes, phonecases and accessories at - https://teespring.com/en-GB/stores/deffinitions-store

*Check out our BEST new videos below*
*Fantastic Beasts The Secrets Of Dumbledore* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1_zVsJMBiU
*Moon Knight Episode 3 Breakdown* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DI6XwRYKpCE
*Severance Ending Explained* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=scIcuBC9JwA
*Doctor Strange In The Multiverse Of Madness Trailer Breakdown* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wCfrYqvi6mc
*Morbius Ending Explained* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TkaZYoN5x1c
*Every Easter Egg In Spider-Man No Way Home* - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XcCbzEgoFLM


/* ----- SOCIAL MEDIA ----- */

Follow Me On Social Media At:
Website - https://heavyspoilers.com/
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@heavyspoilers?lang=en
Twitter - https://twitter.com/heavyspoilers
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/heavyspoilers/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/DeffinitionMC/


/* ----- VIDEO INFORMATION ----- */

Welcome to the Heavy Spoilers show I'm your host Paul and the sun shines on us again brother as the first trailer for Thor Love And Thunder is now here.

It's time to Ragnarok and roll so follow us as we go through everything you need to know about the movie, the easter eggs, hidden details and things you missed.

Full spoilers ahead for what happens in the comics and whilst Marvel never completely adapt storylines, I'm gonna tell you to p**s off ghost if you don't want things ruined. Please hit the thumbs up button if you enjoy the breakdown and make sure you subscribe for the channel where you have to hand it to us that the worst puns make the cut and that's how we get our paper. Little rock paper scissors joke there so with that out the way, thanks for clicking this, now let's get into Thor Love And Thunder.

Now the trailer very much opens with a montage and Thor talking about how much his hands are now used for peace.

There's very much an 80s training vibe to ity in the same vein of rocky and this whole movie seems to be paying tribue to the decade.

He starts off by running and we watch as through the magic of montage how he ages up. This includes his classic costume which looks amazing and we catch him meditating on a planet with what I believe has 3 suns, two moons and a saturn like one.

Thor trains away using chains instead of ropes and on his hat we can actually catch the classic Avengers Logo with the writing strongest over the top. This is of course a nod to Ragnarok when he called himself that.

Now Thor looks like he's very much been on a wellness retreat and the guy has lost all the dead weight like Screen Crush when they let Ryan Arey go and allow Doug to run the channel. Getting a lot of Hippy vibes from this and we also see Stormbreaker planted in the ground. The handle for the axe of course came from Groots arm and we see it in the ground growing roots, showing how long that Thor has been there for.

The guardians show up and alongside them are some blue alience creatures. These are potentially the interdites who have been touched upon in the marvel expanded universe.

They were first mentioned by Lady Sif in the Agents Of Shield episode and we do know that Jamie Alexander will be playing her once more in the movie.

Music - LAKEY INSPIRED - Arcade
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/lakeyinspired
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lakeyinspired

snippet.title: Police Interrogations: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (HBO)
snippet.description:
John Oliver discusses the tactics that can make police interrogations so damaging, particularly for the innocent, and why he’s more of a Lorelai than a Rory.

Connect with Last Week Tonight online...

snippet.title: Spence vs Ugas HIGHLIGHTS: April 16, 2022 | PBC on Showtime PPV
snippet.description:
(April 16, 2022) Errol Spence Jr. navigated treacherous waters on Saturday night to pick up a third welterweight title. The IBF and WBC welterweight champion showed his greatness against WBA champion Yordenis Ugás, battling back from early adversity to stop Ugás in the tenth round.
 
The remaining welterweight title not in Spence’s possession belongs to WBO titleholder Terence Crawford, who was an interested observer on Saturday, Tweeting his reaction to the Spence victory. Spence made clear his preference for his next opponent.  
 
“Everybody knows who I want next,” Spence said. “I want Terence Crawford. That’s the fight that I want. That’s the fight everybody else wants. Like I said, I’m going to get these straps then go over there and take his too. Terence I’m coming for that belt!”
 
Spence had to overcome some harsh conditions courtesy of Ugás to get to this point. After Ugás hurt Spence in the sixth, knocking his mouthpiece out with an uppercut, Spence of DeSoto, Texas, stormed back to hurt Ugás repeatedly to the body and eye. By the tenth round, Ugás’ right eye was completely shut when referee Laurence Cole stopped the contest for the second time to allow the ringside physician to inspect the damage.
 
Unlike earlier, the doctor advised Cole to stop the bout at 1:44 of the tenth round, giving Spence (28-0, 22 KOs) a resounding victory, a third welterweight belt, and perhaps the greatest triumph of his still accumulating career following a 17-month layoff after corrective surgery to his left eye forced him to pull out of a mega-fight with Manny Pacquiao.  
 
“I feel sad,” Ugás said. “I trained really hard for this fight. All my respect to Errol Spence. He’s a great champion. I’m just sad about what happened tonight. The referee stopped the fight, but I wanted to keep going to the end. I definitely had a chance to win the fight in the sixth round, but he recuperated well. Congratulations to him and his team.”

#ErrolSpenceJr #YordenisUgas #SpenceUgas

Visit PremierBoxingChampions.com for more info.

SIGN UP FOR FIGHT ALERTS: 

https://pbcham.ps/FightAlerts

FOLLOW US:

https://twitter.com/premierboxing
https://instagram.com/premierboxing
https://www.facebook.com/premierboxingchampions

snippet.title: #7 NETS at #2 CELTICS | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | April 17, 2022
snippet.description:
Jayson Tatum made a spinning layup as time expired in regulation to lift the No. 2 seed Celtics over the No. 7 seed Nets in Game 1, 115-114. Jayson Tatum finished with 31 PTS, 4 REB and 8 AST for the Celtics, while Kyrie Irving (39 PTS, 5 REB, 6 AST) and Kevin Durant (23 PTS, 4 REB, 3 AST) combined for 62 PTS for the Nets. The Celtics lead this best-of-seven First Round series 1-0.
Next Game ➜ Brooklyn Nets vs. Boston Celtics - April 20 at 7pm/et on TNT. Stay up-to-date on news, live scores and stats with the NBA App 📲https://app.link.nba.com/NBA_App22

Subscribe to the NBA: https://on.nba.com/2JX5gSN
